format: A data frame with 16 observations on the following 4 variables.
description:
Description
The number of immobile daphnids –in contrast to mobile daphnids– out of a total of 20 daphnids was counted 
for several concentrations of a toxic substance.
title: Daphnia test
reference: The same daphnids were counted at 24h and later again at 48h.
